mapper.select: SELECT gcg.gc_id,gc.gc_name,COUNT(gcg.goods_id) as num FROM shigu_gys_category_goods AS gcg LEFT JOIN shigu_goods_tiny_${webSite} AS sgt ON gcg.goods_id=sgt.goods_id LEFT JOIN shigu_gys_custom_category AS gc ON gcg.gc_id=gc.gc_id WHERE sgt.goods_status=0 AND sgt.is_closed=0 AND gcg.gcg_status=1 AND gcg.s_id=#{shopId} GROUP BY gcg.gc_id
mapper.update: UPDATE shigu_gys_category_goods AS gcg SET gcg.gc_id = #{cateId} WHERE gcg.goods_id=#{goodsId}
